sentence: The DC Attorney General, as the District's chief law       officer, is also responsible for local legal issues, namely,       protecting the District and its residents in a wide range of       matters, such as enforcing child support laws, handling abuse       and neglect proceedings in the child welfare system,       enforcing our housing code, and defending District agencies       and officers when they are sued.
